name: OnStream
overview:
OnStream provides gas and electricity metering solutions to the UK.

OnStream is a National Grid company â€“ the UKâ€™s largest investor-owned utility business. They offer a flexible and professional range of meter management services to UK energy suppliers. To date, OnStream has installed in excess of two million gas meters and one million electricity meters. OnStream provides gas meter reading services for both domestic and non-domestic customers.

They currently operate traditional meter reading services alongside world-class Automated Meter Reading services, through which they collect consumption data on a daily basis. OnStream offers smart metering services aimed at improving service provision and reducing environmental impact.

They are an active participant in industry discussions and government policy development. So far they have installed 27,000 smart meters, both in homes and businesses.To support smart metering they offer data collection and aggregation services ensuring a holistic, end-to-end service for their customers.
